res.facets: Comments are not permitted in JSON

items.description: Caroline Bauer was institutionalized by her husband, John James Bauer. She petitioned for a writ of habeas corpus, which was granted, and was ultimately released.
items.title: In the Matter of Caroline Bauer By the Habeas Corpus Act
items.title_sort: in the matter of caroline bauer by the habeas corpus act
items.publisher: Center for Research in the Digital Humanities, University of Nebraska-Lincoln
items.source: St. Louis Circuit Court, Civil Case Files, Box 282, Folder 6: February Term 1868, No. 8456

spatial.place_name: St. Louis, St. Louis County, Missouri
